instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message:
hello friends, i am just working on that  board. MCP still original with edgebonding, seems not touched.

got it yesterday. problem turning on, led is constant on, fan is spinning, no display.

i checked the power rails

seems to be all there

the PP5v_s0 is 5.11V , is that ok ?

the only one what i missed is PPVTT_S0_DDR_LDO

DDRVTT_EN is 0V as well

need some help here.

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: CPU Vcore present?

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: is the PPVTT_S0_DDR_LDO power rail turned on later ?

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: Cpu vcore = 0v

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message:
IMVP_VR_ON_R = 3,43V (R7160 Pin 2)
PPVIN_S5_CPU_IMVP 12.6V
PP5V_S0_CPU_IMVP = 5.1V

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: Q7100, Q7101, Q7102, Q7103  on Pin4 no impulses to see

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: CPU Vcore should be there so something is wrong there. Usually R7120, check voltages to pin 20,22,31.

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: found now in the corner left from the cpu under the cpu coil some korosion. this should be the problem. I will try to solv it and report back.

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: No Title

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message:
i replaced now all the resistors and caps ich were looking bad
still i had to solder 2 wires
one from R7123 Pin2 (CPU_VCCSENSE_N) to R1101 Pin1
second from R7122 Pin 1 (IMVP6_VSEN_P) to C7131 Pin1 

now I have CPU Vcore 1,0V

but still no display

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: Led is still constant lighning, no dong and no beeps or blinking led without RAM

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: forgot, still needful was a wire from R7115 pin 1 to R7118 Pin2

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message:
No Title

still an update from that area  after ultrasonic before repair

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message:
No Title

is 1.0V CPU Vcore ok ? in the schematic i found should be 1.25V ??

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message:
by the way now is 
DDRVTT_EN present and PPVTT_S0_DDR_LDO is 0.75V

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message:
I heated up 100C the GPU and voila display is coming. So after replace GPU should working that machine. :-)
thanks duke for help.

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: These GPUs are fine, do not touch it.

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: ok. so i tested now in the machine but still in asd have some errors and a higher fan spin

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: No Title

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message:
I checked already U5570,5500,5550 and the area around and the q5503,5501

everything looks good and i measured in diode mode and compared with a donar board , same values

PP3V3_S0 is present

the i2c lines are 3.3v and have some data

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message: maybe the smc has a problem ?

threads.title: 820-2330 no display
threads.message:
i gave i light reflow like louis rossmann showed in the clips (thank you for all that good videos!)
now the problem is not present anymore.
